componentDescription: A versatile component for searching, filtering, and executing commands or actions.

open.description: Controls the open/closed state of the command dialog.

onOpenChange.description: Callback function invoked when the open state of the command dialog changes.

groups.description: An optional array of command groups to be displayed.

commands.description: An optional array of individual command items to be displayed.

placeholder.description: Placeholder text to display in the command input field when it's empty.

size.description: Defines the predefined size of the command component.

variant.description: Specifies the visual variant or style of the command component.

filter.description: A custom filter function to determine if a command item matches the search input.

emptyState.description: React node to render when there are no command items to display (e.g., after filtering).

footer.description: React node to render at the bottom of the command dialog, often for actions or information.

views.description: Custom styling properties for various parts of the Command component.
